javacom

Class StudentSpawner

  • java.lang.Object
    • javacom.StudentSpawner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class StudentSpawner
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A runnable spawner Class. The StudentSpawner will send spawn request to a new Communicator-instance. The amount of students that should be spawned is set in the constructor.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mr who?, Mr you!

    • Field Detail

      • iterSync

        public static java.lang.Integer iterSync

      • iter

        public static int iter
        The current spawn amount. If iter gets larger than numberOfStudents the StudentSpawner will stop spawning new students.

      • spawn_sem

        static java.util.concurrent.Semaphore spawn_sem

    • Constructor Detail

      • StudentSpawner

        public StudentSpawner(int sRate,
              int switchRate,
              int numberOfStudents,
              com.ericsson.otp.erlang.OtpNode jNode)
        Constructor which will setup parameters.
        Parameters:
        sRate - The spawn rate which spawnRate will be set to.
        switchRate - The switch rate which switchRate will be set to.
        numberOfStudents - The spawn limit.
        jNode - The reference to the Erlang-node on the java part of the program.

      • run

        public void run()
        The run method fulfilling the Runnable interface. Will try to spawn a new student every second until iter >= numberOfStudents
